metadata.title: RZ/V2H: Application Compatibility with the RZ/V Series

sections.content:
Question:
Can AI applications developed with other RZ/V Series be used on the RZ/V2H?
Answer:
The CPU (Arm Cortex-A55) and GPU (Arm Mali G31) are the same type, but the USB and other peripheral functions have different specifications, so applications that use those will require amendments to the source code.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2H
